March 2016 Newsletter Introducing the new BigCommerce You probably noticed that BigCommerce has a different look. We launched a new brand identity at the end of March to better reflect who we are and what we do. This updated brand represents our commitment to powering growth, removing complexity and supporting businesses around the world. Read more <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/new-bigcommerce-brand.html]]> Early access — new responsive themes We’re giving you early access to more than 60 beautiful new themes <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme-store/]]> that will help you engage shoppers and encourage checkouts on any device. Updated QuickBooks Online and Xero apps Our QuickBooks Online <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/quickbooks-online/]]> and Xero <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/xero/]]> apps are now faster and easier to configure, with quicker load times, fewer steps and other various improvements. Show off your store to win up to $5,000 in prizes The 2016 BigCommerce Design Awards celebrate excellence in ecommerce design. Enter your store <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/DesignAwards.html]]> for a chance to win a feature in Inc. Magazine and more. Customer spotlight — Solange Knowles Solange Knowles relaunched her store on BigCommerce, using our new themes to get exactly the look she wanted. See how it turned out <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/solange-knowles/]]>. Add a Shop section to Facebook BigCommerce integrates with the new Facebook Shop section <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/introducing-facebook-shop-for-bigcommerce-businesses/]]> to let you showcase your products to billions of users. Easily send your products to Facebook right from the BigCommerce control panel. Shoppers can browse the mobile-friendly storefront on your Facebook page, then click through to your site for checkout. Read more <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/introducing-facebook-shop-for-bigcommerce-businesses/]]> Sync your inventory with Square
Now you can sync your BigCommerce inventory with the Square POS. Save time and eliminate overselling by having your inventory automatically updated whenever you make a sale, online or offline. Learn more about our Square integration <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/bigcommerce-and-square-launch-inventory-sync/]]> and how to sync your inventory.
